__e: Tom, what are you doing here?
"He's a real friend," he said, and he'd share everything with him.
Something that only a true friend would do for me.
My monitor is probably one of those bitches upstairs.
Yeah, I'm happy, because that's the first time you've ever done something like a real person.
- Plus I've been alone in my office so long it's nice to feel like a real person, have people to talk to about things.
And let me guess. Like a gentleman, he held your hair back the whole time.
No, no. Not a proper gentleman.
You are too much the gentleman, but really, I'm fine.
I'm sorry for you, but he's a real man!
A woman is only a woman, but a man must be a man, a real man.
You want to grow up and be a man, you pay attention to him and not me.
Yeah, he was a real hero, my father was.
One that I didn't like that much, the other who is a real hero to me.
It's not every day your boss becomes a bona fide hero.
Well, who really cares what her name is.
Even if that's a real name, he ain't here. This is an Internal Affairs investigation.
Even though it is not your real name, right?
Well, who really cares what her name is.
Even though it is not your real name, right?
Even if that's a real name, he ain't here. This is an Internal Affairs investigation.
